title: Wasted in the Wegner Wing
description: The Detective arrived at the hospital to deliver his nephew to his sister who herself had just delivered a little girl. The Detective was delighted to introduce himself to his neice and his nephew was delighted to explain all about the summer camp murder to his mother, who was horrified. However, before the Detective could explain, another murder happened, right there in the hospital. Man, who would expect death in a place with dying people?

personList.name: Doctor Danube
personList.description: A renowned German surgeon known for separating conjoined twins and an unsettling smile. He plans on retiring to the German countryside soon. Something about wanting to focus on some personal resarch.

personList.name: Administrator Vermillion
personList.description: The hospital administrator and Dean of Medicine is usually busy trying to wrangle the genius running a department found in no other hostpital. Stressed as she is, perhaps she needs a way to let off some steam.

personList.name: Nurse Rose
personList.description: Her bubly personality is very unique. Just like her 16 sisters working at the other hospitals in the region. Though it's weird that she's here given she's trained to treat animals.

weaponList.name: Pocket-Sized Ball
weaponList.description: This red and white ball has a button on it. I wonder what could be inside?

weaponList.name: Fluid-filled Syringe
weaponList.description: The fluid in this syringe is a vibrant chartreuse. Hopefully that's just the color.

weaponList.name: Pen
weaponList.description: It's an ordinary pen. Which can still be good for stabbing.

locationList.name: Office
locationList.description: A normal office for normal things like signing paper work. It even offers complete privacy.

locationList.name: Stairwell
locationList.description: A perfect place to get away from it all. Especially if "it all" includes the scene of a crime.

locationList.name: Roof
locationList.description: If you're looking for some fresh air, might as well come up here. For some reason, the staff can't be bothered to lock the door.

cluesList: Mysterious fluid was found in the stairwell.
Nurse Rose did not have a weapon made of glass or plastic.
The pen was not where it belonged.
The corpse was found at the bottom of a flight of stairs.
hint: The Oracle asked the spirits who said they saw Doctor Danube with a syringe

resolution.resolutionText: Doctor Danube responded to the accusation with a lot of words. Unfortunately, the Detective's short list of known languages did not include German, so he would never know what very incriminating statements the doctor was most surely making in his native tongue. Shrugging, the Detective said goodbye to his sister and her family before heading on out.
